capabilities.name: generate_travel_plan_prompt
capabilities.description: 根据输入参数生成详细的旅行规划提示词 (Generate a detailed travel planning prompt based on input parameters)

capabilities.name: generate_travel_html_render_prompt
capabilities.description: 根据旅行规划描述生成用于渲染HTML的提示词 (Generate a prompt for rendering HTML based on the travel plan description)

capabilities.name: get_html_rendering_styles
capabilities.description: 获取用于生成旅行计划HTML的详细设计风格和技术规范说明 (Get detailed design styles and technical specifications for generating travel plan HTML)
